keywords.value: Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Prices increased in several states, 10 days after the discovery of a pipeline rupture in Alabama that prompted worries about environmental contamination.

headline.print_headline: Gas Prices  Rise in South  After Rupture in a Pipeline
headline.main: Gas Prices Surge in South After Pipeline Leak

snippet: Prices increased in several states, 10 days after the discovery of a pipeline rupture in Alabama that prompted worries about environmental contamination....
abstract: Gasoline prices rise again in Deep South, ten days after discovery of Alabama pipeline rupture that imperiled fuel supplies and caused concern over environmental contamination; industry observers say prices will go down again once gas was again flowing freely.
